title: Bug 6009 - New class wizard doesn't get context right for nested classes
OB: When using the new class wizard, the context for nested classes is not being determined correctly.
SR:
To reproduce this issue, perform the following steps:
1. Open the new class wizard.
2. Choose to create a nested class within an existing class.
3. Proceed with the creation of the nested class.
4. Verify that the context for the nested class is not set correctly.
